title: About Me
text:
Hi, Iâ€™m Olivia â€” the dog-crazy person behind Dog Sit Daily. Iâ€™m a calm, detail-oriented carer who treats every dog like my own. Iâ€™m experienced with dogs of all ages, from lively puppies to wise seniors, and Iâ€™ve always had dogs in my home. Pet sitting is a service I once relied on myself, so I understand how life-changing it is to have someone you truly trust looking after your dog â€” especially if they have separation anxiety!

    Whether your dog needs a walk, a cosy place to stay, or just some company while youâ€™re away, Iâ€™m here to help. Iâ€™ve attended many group and 1:1 training sessions, picked up plenty of tips and tricks, and know how to build confidence in anxious dogs. Every dog has their own personality â€” my goal is to make each one feel safe, comfortable, and happy while theyâ€™re with me.
  






âœ”ï¸ 15 yearsâ€™ experience with puppies through seniors (including anxious dogs)


âœ”ï¸ Walks tailored to age and energy â€” even on rainy days!


âœ”ï¸ Small numbers only â€” quality over quantity


âœ”ï¸ Honest, regular updates (photos, messages, progress notes)


âœ”ï¸ First-aid aware and fully insured with Petplan







I live in a relaxed, calm home with a secure garden and plenty of space for play and downtime.
If your dog has specific needs â€” medication, crate training, recall work, or feeding routines â€” Iâ€™ll always follow your plan so they feel safe and understood.
